original_title: The Hazards of Helen Ep13: The Escape on the Fast Freight
overview: Two yeggmen hold up Helen, on night duty at Ferndale, lock her in a closet, and escape. Later, standing on a bridge over the freight yards, Helen sees the two bandits aboard an outgoing freight, and drops onto the roof of the car from above as it crosses underneath. A chase along the roofs of the speeding cars ensues...
title: The Hazards of Helen Ep13: The Escape on the Fast Freight
